mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission (id, `name`, module, description, `key`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
